titleInfo.title: Oral history interview with Walker Whiteside, 1980 September 03, excerpt 02

physicalDescription.note: Excerpted from: HNIOHWhitesideW audio cassette recording converted to mp3 format in 2006.

location.physicalLocation: Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219

mods.abstract: An excerpt from an oral history interview with Walker Whiteside, conducted on 3 September 1980 by Leanne Thornton as part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. 1910-1935 Oral History Project. Whiteside discusses taking a date to see the opera Il Trovatore, including a humorous anecdote about the Anvil Chorus. The complete interview, as well as an index, is available in the repository.

titleInfo.title: Historic Nashville, Inc. 1910-1935 Oral History Project

Please contact the Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219. Telephone (615) 862-5782.
